package.description:
driver for the VR-space WinTracker
To run the wintracker_node without sodo privileges add a rule into /etc/udev/rules.d/80-wintracker.rules $ sudo sh -c "echo 'SUBSYSTEM=="usb", ATTR{idVendor}=="04b4", ATTR{idProduct}=="64df", MODE="0666"' >> /etc/udev/rules.d/80-wintracker.rules" $ sudo restart udev
The wintracker node is based on the code written by Mathias Broxvall.
package.author: chrust
